name: authorization-policy
description: Defines an authorization policy including temporal validity, authorized clients, constraints, and scope of access.

fields.name: not-before
fields.description: The policy is not valid before this date and time.

fields.name: not-after
fields.description: The policy is not valid after this date and time.

fields.name: clients
fields.description: A list of client identifiers to which this policy applies.

fields.name: constraint
fields.description: Constraints on the origin and authentication method for this policy.

fields.name: scope
fields.description: The scope of access granted by this policy.
